lead_paragraph: The surging Anaheim Ducks earned their 11th consecutive victory, beating the Kings, 3-2, on Saturday in Los Angeles.

headline.print_headline: Ducks Beat Kings and Take Over the Pacific Division Lead; Late Surge Lifts the Predators
headline.main: Ducks Beat Kings and Take Over the Pacific Division Lead; Late Surge Lifts the Predators

snippet: The surging Anaheim Ducks earned their 11th consecutive victory, beating the Kings, 3-2, on Saturday in Los Angeles.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Anaheim Mighty Ducks beat Los Angeles Kings. 3-2, other hockey scores noted.
